name: Reads
tagline: :books: A list of physical books I own or want to read.
body: # Reads > :books: A list of physical books I own or want to read. If you have book recommendations for me, please [create a Pull Request](https://github.com/starandtina/reads/compare) adding a link at the end of [`README`](https://github.com/starandtina/reads/blob/master/README.md). ## Ratings - :new_moon: Haven't read yet - :waxing_crescent_moon: :first_quarter_moon: :moon: Reading progress - :full_moon: Finished reading - :full_moon_with_face: **Wouldn't recommend** - :star2: **Loved it** # Table of Contents 1. [Web Performance](#wpo) 1. [Languages](#languages) 1. [User Experience/Interaction Design/Usability](#ux) 1. [Product Design](#product-design) 1. [Art/Design](#art-design) 1. [Internals](#internals) 1. [Development Philosophy](#development-philosohpy) 1. [Algorithms](#algos) 1. [AI](#ai) 1. [Databases](#db) 1. [Marketing/Sales/Negotiation](#marketing-sales-negotiation) 1. [On Thinking](#thinking) 1. [Startups/Businesses](#startups-businesses) 1. [Teamwork](#teamwork) 1. [Personalities/Life Stories](#personalities-life) 1. [Comics/Casual Reads](#comics-casual-reads) 1. [Novels](#novels) ---- ## Web Performance - :star2: [High Performance Web Sites Essential Knowledge for Front-End Engineers](http://amzn.to/1PMIVCQ) - :star2: [Even Faster Web Sites Performance Best Practices for Web Developers](http://amzn.to/1SCYY9b) - :full_moon: [Designing for Performance Weighing Aesthetics and Speed](http://amzn.to/1SCZ0hj) - :new_moon: [High Performance Browser Networking What every web developer should know about networking and web performance](http://amzn.to/1S6Vo7O) - :star2: [High Performance JavaScript Build Faster Web Application Interfaces](http://amzn.to/1PMIWXs) - :star2: [Web Performance Daybook Volume 2 32 leading web performance experts offer practical tips, techniques, and advice for optimizing your site’s user experience](http://amzn.to/21SDmIT) - :full_moon: [Using WebPageTest Web Performance Testing for Novices and Power Users](http://amzn.to/1L95y6f) - :new_moon: [Book of Speed The business, psychology and technology of high-performance web apps](http://bit.ly/1QuSAyG) ## Languages - :full_moon: [JavaScript: The Good Parts Reveal a subset of JavaScript that's more reliable, readable, and maintainable](http://amzn.to/21PwQWK) - :star2: [You Don't Know JS A book series on JavaScript. ](https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS) - :full_moon: [Effective JavaScript 68 Specific Ways to Harness the Power of JavaScript](http://amzn.to/1L9EqEn) - :full_moon: [Expert JavaScript Take a deep dive into JavaScript and build better applications](http://amzn.to/1TkuUAG) - :waxing_crescent_moon: [Professional JavaScript for Web Developer a developer-level introduction along with more advanced and useful features of JavaScript](http://amzn.to/1Rv6LS5) - :new_moon: [Eloquent JavaScript A Modern Introduction to Programming](http://amzn.to/1S6VxrX) - :new_moon: [Advanced Programming in the UNIX Environment](http://amzn.to/1S6VLiD) - :new_moon: [Beginning Ruby From Novice to Professional](http://amzn.to/1S6WVee) - :new_moon: [Learn You a Haskell for Great Good! A Beginner's Guide](http://amzn.to/1SD1koq) - :new_moon: [Learning Python](http://amzn.to/1S6XiFt) - :new_moon: [Programming Elixir `Functional |> Concurrent |> Pragmatic |> Fun`](http://amzn.to/1PMIVmv) - :new_moon: [The Art of UNIX Programming](http://amzn.to/1PMISXS) - :star2: [Secrets of the JavaScript Ninja Takes you on a journey towards mastering modern JavaScript development in three phases: design, construction, and maintenance](http://amzn.to/1L9Ehk6) - :star2: [Speaking JavaScript An in-depth guide for JavaScript programmer](http://speakingjs.com/es5/index.html) - :first_quarter_moon: [Understanding ECMAScript 6](https://leanpub.com/understandinges6/read/) - :first_quarter_moon: [Exploring ES6 Upgrade to the next version of JavaScript](https://leanpub.com/exploring-es6/read) - :new_moon: [JavaScript Application Design A Build First Approach](http://amzn.to/1L9Et2P) - :full_moon: [Human JavaScript This book will help you build native HTML5 apps](http://read.humanjavascript.com/) - :moon: [Maintainable JavaScript Some tips on how to effectively work on a team with a large application](http://amzn.to/1QElCtF) ## User Experience/Interaction Design/Usability - :new_moon: [Adaptive Web Design Crafting Rich Experiences with Progressive Enhancement](http://amzn.to/1SCYY97) - :star2: [About Face The Essentials of Interaction Design _(3rd edition)_](http://amzn.to/1SD0KXQ) - :full_moon: [Defensive Design for the Web How to improve error messages, help, forms, and other crisis points](http://amzn.to/1S6XMeX) - :star2: [Don't Make Me Think A Common Sense Approach to Web Usability](http://amzn.to/1SD00SB) - :full_moon_with_face: [Lean UX Applying Lean Principles to Improve User Experience](http://amzn.to/1S6V4WA) - :full_moon: [The Design of Everyday Things](http://amzn.to/1SD0MyZ) - :full_moon: [The Inmates Are Running the Asylum Why High Tech Products Drive Us Crazy and How to Restore the Sanity](http://amzn.to/1S6X80P) - :new_moon: [CSS Secrets Better Solutions to Everyday Web Design Problems](http://amzn.to/1PMIVml) ## Product Design - :new_moon: [Product Design for the Web Principles of Designing and Releasing Web Products](http://amzn.to/1M1Xxem) - :new_moon: [Hooked How to Build Habit-Forming Products](http://amzn.to/1SCZ0h2) - :star2: [Inspired How To Create Products Customers Love](http://amzn.to/1SD1EDE) ## Art Design - :new_moon: [How Buildings Learn What Happens After They're Built](http://amzn.to/1SCYQX0) - :new_moon: [The Accidental Masterpiece On the Art of Life and Vice Versa](http://amzn.to/1SCYXSE) - :new_moon: [What Are You Looking At? The Surprising, Shocking, and Sometimes Strange Story of 150 Years of Modern Art](http://amzn.to/1SCYY90) ## Internals - :star2: [CLR via C#](http://amzn.to/1PhSuHf) - :waxing_crescent_moon: [Compilers: Principles, Techniques, and Tools](http://amzn.to/1SD1YCe) - :full_moon: [Mastering Regular Expressions](http://amzn.to/1SD0Ezx) ## Development Philosophy - :full_moon_with_face: [Becoming a Technical Leader An Organic Problem-Solving Approach](http://amzn.to/1S6XLHD) - :new_moon: [Clean Code A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship](http://amzn.to/1S6YFnH) - :new_moon: [Domain-Driven Design Tackling Complexity in the Heart of Software](http://amzn.to/1S6WwIL) - :full_moon: [Getting Real The Smarter, Faster, Easier Way to Build a Successful Web Application](http://amzn.to/1SD1FHK) - :full_moon: [Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code](http://amzn.to/1S6Z49J) - :full_moon: [The Clean Coder A Code of Conduct for Professional Programmers](http://amzn.to/1S6YGrH) - :star2: [The Pragmatic Programmer From Journeyman to Master](http://amzn.to/1S6WZdR) - :moon: [Working Effectively with Legacy Code start-to-finish strategies for working more effectively with large, untested legacy code bases](http://amzn.to/1YkpDsg) ## Algorithms - :first_quarter_moon: [Code Complete A Practical Handbook of Software Construction](http://amzn.to/1PhS8R3) - :full_moon: [Hacker's Delight](http://amzn.to/1S6WsIQ) - :full_moon: [Head First Design Patterns](http://amzn.to/1S6XaGb) - :star2: [Programming Pearls](http://amzn.to/1SD1fRH) ## AI - :new_moon: [Programming Collective Intelligence Building Smart Web 2.0 Applications](http://amzn.to/1S6WH6L) ## Databases - :full_moon: [NoSQL Distilled A Brief Guide to the Emerging World of Polyglot Persistence](http://amzn.to/1S6W5xP) - :full_moon: [Understanding MySQL Internals](http://amzn.to/1S6WT5P) ## Marketing/Sales/Negotiation - :new_moon: [Crossing the Chasm Marketing and Selling Disruptive Products to Mainstream Customers](http://amzn.to/1SCZnIs) - :new_moon: [How to Win Friends & Influence People](http://amzn.to/1SCZ0h6) - :full_moon: [The Win Without Pitching Manifesto](http://amzn.to/1SD0k3G) ## On Thinking - :new_moon: [Antifragile Things That Gain from Disorder](http://amzn.to/1PMIVmz) - :new_moon: [Gödel, Escher, Bach An Eternal Golden Braid](http://amzn.to/1SCZ00J) - :star2: [Thinking, Fast and Slow](http://amzn.to/1SCZOm6) ## Startups/Businesses - :full_moon: [Rework](http://amzn.to/1SD1coP) - :full_moon: [Remote Office Not Required](http://amzn.to/1ROogiZ) - :new_moon: [Start-up Nation The Story of Israel's Economic Miracle](http://amzn.to/1SCZ0h4) - :new_moon: [The Innovator’s Dilemma When New Technologies Cause Great Firms to Fail](http://amzn.to/1SCYYG9) - :star2: [The Lean Startup How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses](http://amzn.to/1SD0Qi5) - :full_moon: [The Year Without Pants WordPress.com and the Future of Work](http://amzn.to/1SCZTX1) - :star2: [Zero to One Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future](http://amzn.to/1S6Va0y) ## Teamwork - :new_moon: [Peopleware Productive Projects and Teams](http://amzn.to/1SD1j3S) - :new_moon: [Rapid Development Taming Wild Software Schedules](http://amzn.to/1SD1rAv) - :new_moon: [The Mythical Man-Month Essays on Software Engineering](http://amzn.to/1PhScjL) - :star2: [Team Geek A Software Developer's Guide to Working Well with Others](http://amzn.to/1QuU7F2) ## Personalities/Life Stories ## Comics/Casual Reads - :moon: [如何变得有思想？ 一个敢于说真话的ITer眼中的世界](http://bit.ly/1OX60iA) - :moon: [How to Read a Book The Classic Guide to Intelligent Reading](http://amzn.to/1SsVuqb) ## Novels - :waxing_crescent_moon: [解忧杂货店 现代人内心流失的东西，这家杂货店能帮你找回](http://dwz.cn/2T5UpP)
